name: Mission:In Boxes
description:
"Mission: In Boxes" is a puzzle escape game in VR space.
Players enter the facility as spies that are responsible for obtaining the indicated target.

In the room where the target is located, use a spy gadget to hack the surveillance camera and avoid various gimmicks.
By moving obstacles such as boxes, opening the way to the goal door and clearing each stage, you can get target.

Can you clear many simple but deep stages?
Enjoy a new sense of VR puzzle escape game!
